reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 343/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY TO VICTORIA COUNTY AND PETERBOROUGH COUNTY - OFFICIAL PLANS AND AMENDMENTS
reg_info.reg_name_text: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY TO VICTORIA COUNTY AND PETERBOROUGH COUNTY — OFFICIAL PLANS AND AMENDMENTS
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 343/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY TO VICTORIA COUNTY AND PETERBOROUGH COUNTY - OFFICIAL PLANS AND AMENDMENTS
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. (1) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Victoria with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Victoria commenced on or after July 1, 1998. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 1 (1). (2) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Peterborough with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Peterborough commenced on or after July 1, 1998. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Victoria with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Victoria commenced on or after July 1, 1998. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 1 (1).

(2) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Peterborough with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Peterborough commenced on or after July 1, 1998. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. (1) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Victoria with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Victoria whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 1. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 2 (1). (2) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Peterborough with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Peterborough whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 2. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Victoria with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Victoria whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 1. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 2 (1).

(2) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of the County of Peterborough with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Peterborough whose file numbers are set out in Schedule 2. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. All authority of the Minister in respect of applications for amendments to the official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Victoria and the County of Peterborough that were made to the local municipalities before July 1, 1998 but were not adopted by the councils of the local municipalities before July 1, 1998 is delegated to the council of the county in which the local municipality is located. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. All authority of the Minister in respect of applications for amendments to the official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Victoria and the County of Peterborough that were made to the local municipalities before July 1, 1998 but were not adopted by the councils of the local municipalities before July 1, 1998 is delegated to the council of the county in which the local municipality is located. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 3.

content.content: 4. (1) If any of the authority delegated to a council in this Regulation is in turn delegated by the council to a committee of council or an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 4 (1). (2) The delegations of authority set out in this Regulation are not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 4 (2).
content.raw_html:
4. (1) If any of the authority delegated to a council in this Regulation is in turn delegated by the council to a committee of council or an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 4 (1).

(2) The delegations of authority set out in this Regulation are not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 343/98, s. 4 (2).

content.content: 4.1 (1) The delegation of the Minister’s authority to the County of Victoria to approve official plans under the Planning Act is withdrawn with respect to the files whose numbers are as follows: 16-OP-0036-031 16-OP-0036-075 O. Reg. 579/98, s. 1. (2) The delegation of the Minister’s authority to the County of Peterborough to approve official plans under the Planning Act is withdrawn with respect to the files whose numbers are as follows: 15-OP-0107-018 15-OP-0107-079 15-OP-0133 O. Reg. 579/98, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
4.1 (1) The delegation of the Minister’s authority to the County of Victoria to approve official plans under the Planning Act is withdrawn with respect to the files whose numbers are as follows:

16-OP-0036-031

16-OP-0036-075

O. Reg. 579/98, s. 1.

(2) The delegation of the Minister’s authority to the County of Peterborough to approve official plans under the Planning Act is withdrawn with respect to the files whose numbers are as follows:

15-OP-0107-018

15-OP-0107-079

15-OP-0133

O. Reg. 579/98, s. 1.
